results.name: Dragon Quest Characters: Torneko no Daibōken 3
Arcade's Greatest Hits: The Atari Collection 1
ACA NEOGEO REAL BOUT FATAL FURY 2

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5 3317U
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Joypad control with an analogue stick is the best way to play the game (eg Xbox controller). Keyboard control is also supported. Mouse control is not supported.
